website_summaries.verdict: This option offers good quality and performance, and also comes with built-in (albeit minimal) speakers.
pros: Comes with VGA and DVI-D inputs
Offers good brightness uniformity, and clear images and text
cons: Plastic stand is a bit flimsy and hard to tilt
Some found this monitor to be too bright at night
Some reports of this option arriving defective

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal....
customer_reviews.text: I saved a lot of money with this great refurbished computer monitor. Normally, its very hard to find a high quality monitor without paying well over a $100. I only paid $66 including shipping. My monitor doesn't have blemishes or scratches. In fact,e I could not find any defects.. I love the 22 inch screen with its vivid color and resolution. Thus, save some money and buy a refurbished ViewSonic monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L. Helzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement For Grandpa's Viewsonic
customer_reviews.text: My dad had a 20" ViewSonic that bit the dust after ten years. At 91, he was able to replace the original with this one just by disconnecting the old monitor and connecting the new one to the same cables. He's happy with the quality of the display as it's as good or better than what he had.
customer_reviews.author: JP KazarianTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought that this was a bad product, BUT it was due to operator error. Once all the correct picture settings are adjusted it has a great picture and is just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Capdude

customer_reviews.title: Works decent with my Mac mini
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty decent in terms of the quality of the display and the versatility/compatibility with Mac OS. I think this is better suited for a Windows PC since it doesn't integrate super well with my Mac mini. For example, for the brightness, although the slider is changing according to my adjustments, the actual brightness reflection is not changing at all on the display and it is a bit bothering, to be frank, to have to use with the same level of brightness day and night.
customer_reviews.author: AKN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, light-weight, very easy to hook up, and price is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Anelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and Detail
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn't expect much. The black levels are decent in a well lite room. The details were nice and crisp. The only thing is the bleeding light from the lower bottom edges if you're viewing in total darkness. You can change that up through the setting with it's provided software (via Windows OS).
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's a Viewsonic!  Enough said.
customer_reviews.text: Viewsonic, is, in my opinion, one of the best monitor makers. This monitor is great - fairly small, has cord-minders in the back and all the right adapter ports. The only negative (for me), is that it is fairly lightweight, as monitors go. Easy to move around, but sometimes I bump into it and knock it over. Undisturbed it is fine. Only adjusts forward and back - no bells and whistles here... but for the price, it is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: My Gateway HX2000 monitor died over a weekend, and off I went to Amazon looking for a replacement. I found this one and took a chance on it, and I am very happy that I did! Nice clear crisp picture, looks good sitting on the desk, and didn't add any additional RF hash to my radio shack down here in the basement! If you're a Ham Radio operator or do anything with radio receivers, this monitor doesn't add any addition noise and it tolerates RF well with no issues. very happy with this purchase, and would buy another without hesitation - a real winner!
customer_reviews.author: NickA

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Clear LED Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I rcently purchased one for my Mac laptop and another for my PC laptop. They both perform very well and give my a much better image than the laptop screens. Bright screens, good color and resolution. I now have a total of 4 ViewSonic monitors and have been very pleased with the results. Hard to beat the quality for the cost of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good price, decent picture quality but sound quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat the price. Picture quality out of the box was pretty bad but after tweaking the settings on both the monitor and my video card I finally got a satisfactory image. The sound quality, however, is pretty bad. I was expecting more from the 2 watt integrated speakers but I'm disappointed. They are loud enough but the sound quality is bad no matter how much I tweak the sound card settings. They completely lack any bass response and are either flat or tinny. This will probably end up in my kids room once I find a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JohnK

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I recall the ViewSonic brand from the old days when an office I worked in had rather dull monitors. However, one of the researchers had a big ViewSonic and I recall being enamored by his lovely monitor. The matte finish reduces glare, color is great. Perfect for my husband whose monitor didn't have built-in speakers. This monitor does includes speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Tabor

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and in good shape. It does what I need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and in good shape. It does what I need it to do. The stand is a little flimsy, But what can you expect for $99. The only problem I had was that it went on sale for $79 the day after I bought it and I could not cancel the order.. A good monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Warden

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Never been disappointed with ViewSonic, but these came at a fantastic price. Along with the Wall Mounts, these bad boys are slim, bright, easy to turn on... Trust me, if you had issues with finding power buttons on monitors before, you're going to love these guys! FYI, I watch a lot video tutorials, produce my own videos with high-end apps, and obviously use them for normal work, and they compare with even my 4K TV right next to my desk. FYI, I didn't rate technical support as I have never needed to contact them (for even past purchased units).
customer_reviews.author: Fred Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck monitor!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old monitor broke so I had to buy this one last min. Great price / bang for your buck and so far so good on the function front. Just literally needed it as a good affordable solution for an older computer I have and it works great! I do Solidworks CAD work on it along with all the other Adobe programs out there so the image quality is good enough for a heavy experienced user of graphics programs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Neither VGA or DVI inputs worked. Monitor simply saw no signal and went into standby mode.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great value - drop everything and click on 'Add to Cart'
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced, nice quality. Mechanically these could be a bit more rugged, but I'd rather spend my dollars on quality video than heavier plastic. I bought two, and both came up quickly and with no issues, and after several months I'm still very happy. Skip the extended warranty, though, as it overlaps with the manufacturer's warranty. And for this price, if one dies after the three-year warranty expires, I won't be too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R

customer_reviews.title: If these are still available grab one. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: If these are still available grab one. I have 3 that I use every day for work. Never a problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Fischer IV

customer_reviews.title: Great tell you, quick service.
customer_reviews.text: I Set up computers for a living. And ViewSonic is been very reliable for me over the years. Screen is sharp, and bright. On the one location that I have to return one for warranty, I was able to speak to an American service rep, they sent the mailing box, that I packed the monitor inside. I believe they paid shipping both ways. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: eth

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, good size monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor!!! Great picture and size for the price. It been used for a few months now and it still looks great. Im not sure if the specs are comparable to other monitors but I cannot see any difference at ALL. I am usually a scrooge on price alone unless it comes to picture quality which I tend to spend more on getting a nice name brand TV or laptop to get a good display. I bought this one for my kids to use so I went with cheaper but I find myself using it pretty often.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Guimarin

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok if you look straight on.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but only if you look straight on--colors and brightness are good. If looking from the side or far away screen has a greenish tint--not at all attractive looking colors--probably because of some sort of eye strain prevention technology. If looking at the screen from the side or above or below the colors are very bad looking.
customer_reviews.author: mandc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy -- stand is crooked and very short and causes screen to tip forward
customer_reviews.text: If you are a normal-size person, don't buy this monitor. The stand is manufactured so it causes the screen to tip forward. It doesn't fall down -- it just forces the user to crane their neck to see it as though you are addressing a toddler all the time. It will cause you neck and back problems. I tried setting mine up on some thick books, but then it did fall down in my lap. Ugh. Also has outdated jacks for connecting to a laptop. You will have to buy adaptors.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Not Like They Use To Be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor on December 6, 2018 and it died on December 10, 2019. I have other ViewSonic monitors that are more than 10 years old and they still work! The other thing about this monitor that I don't like is that there is no height adjustability as in other models. I ordered another one just because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: Before COVID went into full swing I ordered another brand of monitors to setup a home office. I was thrilled with the quality for the price. When COVID was in full force, finding a monitor to buy was like finding toilet paper at the store - almost impossible. I bought this only because it was the best quality at the beat price. I was surprised that the quality of view sonic didn’t meet the quality of a cheaper and lesser brand I purchased previously but it works great none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards Family

customer_reviews.title: You get alot of screen quality for an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: I own a HP 2207, which is an excellent LCD monitor... and wanted a second, but they are not made anymore (used are over a $100! for an old LCD panel! ha). SO, I bought this screen based on the reviews and specs. AND the reviews were spot on... great screen and is slightly better then my highly rated HP. This screen had better anti-glare, and seemed a little faster on game screen refresh rate. The color is very rich... very happy. The ViewSonic is wider and less tall then the HP, which was a little surprising, but is ok! Would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing to say the least
customer_reviews.text: The previous reviewers let me down on this one.. .Poor construction. Stand is not adjustable in any way, and is low and angled forward. It also slants to one side slightly, really. Very uncomfortable to view, I have it propped up on a large book right now. Picture is just ok, really have to mess with brightness and contrast to get a decent picture. (it's not pre-set out of the box?) The main reason I bought this was the built in speakers for space saving reasons. I did not expect great sound, but these sound horrible. Like the old-school pc speakers that were built in to computers before they made external speakers; tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Spacely

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, using for telework
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and took a chance on the price low end and to my surprise they are working out great. i need two screens for layering database files. They were plug and play and can't be happier for working from home. I didnt check tech support because I haven't had to use it. Great monitors!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple monitor for home office!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great monitor. I use it as a second monitor in my home office and it's ideal. I'm not a coder or a gamer, so I wasn't looking for anything fancy, and this has been perfect for my needs, especially for the price. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a monitor that was getting quite old and jittery. This one is has a fairly sharp picture but it is very bright and seems a little washed out after compensating for that even after adjusting everything I could find in the menu. The brightness may be an advantage if you are stuck in an office with tons of light, but for me it is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good if all you're looking for is a monitor with beautiful color. There is no sound, but you can always just add speakers. I'm using this for my home office. The laptop screen is just to small and this was the perfect solution. The set up was simple and it came with all the cords I needed. It was more bang for my buck!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: IMHO, the most trusted name in monitors
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these recently and have used ViewSonic monitors for 20 years now. One of them had a dead pixel upon arrival, but not worth shipping back over. At under $100, great size monitors for the price. They replace a couple 19" Viewsonic's that I bought 15 years ago that started acting up (and for all the use they got, owed me nothing).
customer_reviews.author: CJRUFF

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic again FTW
customer_reviews.text: They're lovely. Fantastic image for the size and the money. I do not use the built-in speakers, which I've heard are a bit tinny. Not an issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: NC Steve

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine, shipping was terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked ViewSonic products and have received great service from Amazon. Not this time, shipping delay was intolerable. In the future I will have to balance my desire to utilize with who the select to be the delivery carrier
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ian Templeton

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a PC technician and have used and sold many Viewsonic monitors, so I trust them, and this one was no disappointment. My only complaint is the controls, which are somewhat difficult not to press incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I have used viewsonic in the past for over 10 + years and always liked their quality. This monitor's refresh rate is 60hz. Nothing thrilling there. YOu do see a little bit of ghosting when you move the windows around quickly. The buttons under the monitor are goofy to control - button "2" is on the left and button "1" is on the right. Aside from that pressing the buttons is difficult and I do not have fat fingers. The default color settings were very poor. I would suggest shopping around more.
customer_reviews.author: ellissa

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting.  Great value!  And really bright!
customer_reviews.text: I went back to buying ViewSonic monitors because I'd enjoyed them so much in the past. The technology in monitors has changed a lot since those days, but the quality and clarity of the ViewSonic product has not changed. The pros: Sharp. Bright. Long-lasting. Economical. The cons: The included monitor stand is flimsy on this particular model. This was not a problem for me because, in each case, I intended to discard the stands and use the monitors on a swing arm VESA mount stand. With this configuration, the thin, light weight monitors work very well. Also, there are speakers built into these monitors, and the cord is included, but I've never used them.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Mac Mini, Macs never die, which I use for playing games. I needed a monitor for it and this one was perfect. I can use it with the Mac and my Raspberry Pi, not both at the same time, because it has a DVI and an HDMI connector.
customer_reviews.author: ebastro

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Just what I needed. This might a newer model than the one from some of the previous reviews that had issues with the stability of the stand. I just followed the instructions, and everything snapped right together, and is rock solid. Sure during an earthquake it might fall, but it would anyway. The resolution is fantastic. Also ordered a DVI to HDMI cable with it, and it is wonderful. Great size, very crisp and clear, especially HD content.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for home office needs!!  Amazing value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased total of 4 of these monitors for setup of home office just prior to the covid 19 quarantine in NJ. They have worked flawlessly and easily were affixed to my four monitor stand. I ended up buying another 2 ( double the original price fyi to be understood ) and a vertical stand to complete a 6 monitor array. Running bloomberg on these screens and work flawlessly with 4 display port nvidia card on HP workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D.

customer_reviews.title: looks good, sounds bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly good monitor for the price, but the built in speakers are a joke. Connected to my mac via VGA cable and an adapter (not included), the sound is ported over by an included stereo jack. But even with the volume turned up high (on the computer AND the monitor) the sound was barely louder than a set of ear buds, and just as tinny. If you need sound as well as picture from this monitor, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Soundtrack

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these two work side by side with each other. They are good quality and a decent size. My son uses these now as I upgraded to two bigger ViewSonic monitors. He says the graphics and colors are pretty good even to play his computer video games on.
customer_reviews.author: SaraandG

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Next to my expensive calibrated Dell it shows good color.
customer_reviews.text: This is monitor number 2 on my desk next to a color calibrated Dell that costs quite a bit more. Very impressed with the color. Much better than the Momitor it replaced. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Sample This

customer_reviews.title: Decent, basic monitor with built in speakers
customer_reviews.text: Decent no frills monitor. I hate that you can't adjust the picture using software, you have to press the buttons and go through all sorts of silly moves. Also, the connectors are tucked into a ridiculously inaccessible area. I literally cut my hands in two places plugging things in. The best thing about this is the built in speakers. Otherwise it would be wildly over priced.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scheide

customer_reviews.title: Best 1080p monitor I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for $100 and I was blown away by the quality. This was a stepping stone in my PC setup to use until I got another 1440p monitor, and it was very much worth it. Color quality is great, it's sharp and does what needs to get done. I have nothing but great experiences with viewsonic monitors. Would highly recommend staying with viewsonic.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice size monitor colors and picture looks great
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size monitor colors and picture looks great. However my only complain would be the sound isn't very loud. Just has a moderate volume even at it's loudest volume of 100% still is quite low. But if your just using it for work purposes only and don't need too much volume then your fine. Speakers are small so it will not project much loud sound.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Other than this the monitor is good - just disappointed in what seems like a short ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the monitor screen started flashing/blinking rapidly. At first it was periodically and eventually it has become more frequently. The flashing/blinking is at a rapid speed. Other than this the monitor is good - just disappointed in what seems like a short lifespan for the product.
customer_reviews.author: J Larson

customer_reviews.title: 1080p at a cheapish price pretty dank
customer_reviews.text: okay so when you view this product the default choice is not the HDMI input be sure to switch from the dvi/vga input if you want hdmi. on the vga/dvi input the audio cable does have a noticeable static noise from the back of the monitor when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new monitor for my computer. I ordered this one and I showed up pretty darn quick! It was easy to hook up to my computer and the picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Great LED monitor....really great!
customer_reviews.text: I know others that have View Sonic computer monitors and decided to get this 22 inch LED computer monitor for my home computer. It's a great monitor and simply a joy to use. It's 22 inches measured like a TV set and picture quality is really good. Fairly easy to adjust your settings and better than the prior Acer 22 inch monitor I had when it comes to setting adjustments. Stand is sturdy and easy to connect the stand to the monitor itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey 440Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - thoroughly enjoy it and the picture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - thoroughly enjoy it and the picture. Needs to have a more firm base and stand, wobbles some when brushed up against and that is scary but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: It's an inexpensive monitor but it'll do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best quality (it's DVI and VGA after all) but for my uses, I needed the cheapest one I could find since I tore it apart for the LCD screen and its components.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Octoroc

customer_reviews.title: Works great, solid monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great, solid monitor. Only has VGA and DCI cable ports in the monitor, so if you're hooking to a laptop with only and HDMI port, you'll need to get an adapter (~15 bucks), No big deal. Worked great for a dual monitor mounting set up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive monitor replacement if you do not have an hdmi output.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a dead and ancient viewsonic 22" monitor. Worked like a charm. The DVI output worked immediately. Have had it for several weeks and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Very poor integrated speakers.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the sound coming from the integrated speakers is terrible. Definitely don't buy if you listen to music from your computer and don't have separate speakers. It will suffice for my purposes since I see short videos now and then but don't use my computer for playing music or watching longer videos/films.
customer_reviews.author: David Tait

customer_reviews.title: they work great and are the perfect size for my desk and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. At times, they “blink” meaning the screen goes black for a second, but otherwise, they work great and are the perfect size for my desk and monitor stand.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: because this one was SUPER bright at first
customer_reviews.text: My monitor at work was dying, and I bought this one. Apparently my monitor was dead-er than I realized, because this one was SUPER bright at first! I had to turn the settings way down to get used to it, but it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. I have two of them mounted to a dual arm mount that is attached to my desk. They are wonderful for this purpose. The sheer amount of screen "real estate" that two 1080 monitors provide is wonderful. The monitor is great. The fact that it was the cheapest 1080 monitor with vesa mounts was why I ended up going with this one but I am glad I did. Budget monitor or not, it is as good as any I have seen anywhere near this price range. Very stylish monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Home Studio Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Decent display panel for the price, not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works as described, and has decent color and resolution for an LCD panel. The monitor body is not high quality, but good enough for most home situations. It has a small tilt, but it is not very adjustable otherwise - not height adjustable at all, nor can you spin it on it's base. A good choice if you need a quick replacement that looks decent. If you're looking for something professional and adjustable, look for another model.
customer_reviews.author: TheGeneral

customer_reviews.title: it is as it said it was
customer_reviews.text: it was everything it said it was, had it for about 3 weeks and no complains of any kind as of yet. as long as it doesn't go out before 1 year, it will stay at 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Comes with the sound, VGA, and power cables only. You have to get your own DVI cable. The speakers are just good enough to listen to audio from video or on-line training/conference/webinar. Don't expect the speakers to be rock the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor for the price. Every ViewSonic display I've owned has always impressed. I use this in my office but feel it's wasted on such menial tasks, outstanding color, clarity and contrast in an inexpensive monitor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TPM

customer_reviews.title: The Viewsonic VA2246M-LED-22-inch LED-Lit LCD Monitor is pretty good but there are some problems.
customer_reviews.text: The Viewsonic VA2246M-LED-22-inch LED-Lit LCD Monitor is pretty good but there are some problems: 1. the sound level is rather weak. 2. The pushbutton controls are difficult to get to at the bottom of the panel and the switch operation is non-intuitive. I had to fuss around with the pushbutton switches for a half-hour to increase the audio volume but I never could get the volume to a reasonably high level. However, the display is bright and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: John EE Baker

customer_reviews.title: Screen is as expected -- I wish there was a tilt function for the base/monitor.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor clips into the base and there isn't any adjustment or tilt allowed -- otherwise, product is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Old Ass Cable is Included
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about picture quality or brightness. In this day and age to sell a HD monitor with VGA cable only. What's wrong with this. Now my broke behind has to try a DVI cable I can afford. Not a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: O.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older, smaller monitor. Matches my larger monitor pretty well, but I don't like that its height can't be adjusted. Because of this, my two monitors can't be perfectly aligned unless I put something underneath the shorter one to boost it an inch or two. Not horrible, but still a bit aggravating. Picture looks great, at least.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If you have a hum read this
customer_reviews.text: I know you are reading this pre-purchase but if you get this and it hums check it. Works beautifully. I only gave it 4 stars because the stand could be better. It moves when the table is barely touched or I am writing. Can't argue with the picture and the plug and play ease with Mac For hum: My monitor caused a hum in my speakers. Went away when I unplugged it. After research I was sure it was just a ground hum. I was already running clean power thru a conditioner so I just put a 3 to 2 prong adapter and the hum went away. Glad I didn't return it as ViewSonic suggested
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Birthday present for my Dad who just turned 70, Originally I had planned on just buying him the same model as mine until I saw that there was a newer model (grrrr!!) than the one I bought less than a year ago. the monitor looks great, has nice built in speakers and for the price, can't be beat. I will probably purchase a second one with a dual monitor stand so that I can get the whole "Batcave" feel to my office. I love Viewsonic and am so glad that my dad loves his big shiny new toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: easy setup. Purchased this to replace a 12 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy setup. Purchased this to replace a 12 year old viewsonic. This is my 3 viewsonic monitor the first one was the old tube style (CRT) and still works after nearly 20 years, I gave it and a computer to my sister when I upgraded 12 years ago, she gave it to a cousin when she got a laptop, they are still using it. The 12 year old monitor went out after a power outage, but it had a long life. Hoping this is just as dependable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doolin

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a small old monitor for my wife and she really likes it. The lack of tilt is annoying, which is why I gave it 4 stars. Jeez, how many cents would it cost to put a hinge on the thing, or at least have it come out of the box at a more useable angle. I got it fixed using the instructions elsewhere in these reviews (thanks whoever posted that stuff). Still it's just a little extra work for a good monitor at a good price, I'm going to get another one for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very poor, tinny sound. As a monitor I guess it's ok, though I never compared it side-by-side with another. As a speaker system it sucks--totally! I think my cell phone sounds almost as good. With sound this poor this monitor should not receive the rating it gets. Perhaps few users use it for music.
customer_reviews.author: Red1rider

customer_reviews.title: Feels good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming monitor, and I love it. I misread the product information, so I thought it had an HDMI port, but it doesn't. There are ways to get around that though, and once you do, this monitor goes to work. My games actually feel faster than when I played them on my TV, so I'd say that it's money well spent. I'm using it to play my PS3, so I'm not sure how well it'd do for a pc, but it feels like a step up from what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: 22" View Sonic LED
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, really nice, for the money.. 22".. Nice size for his desk, good color, has speakers, but could be better there Ok.. Didn't buy it for the speakers.. Like View Sonic products!! (Also have a 24" also like it.)
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great PC monitor at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great quality. Reliable Viewsonic monitor with no issues. Picture quality is good refresh rate works
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Newton

customer_reviews.title: The Color reproduction between two identical units, (exact same ...
customer_reviews.text: The Color reproduction between two identical units, (exact same size and model number), is not accurate. One is cooler and other is neutral, with the same settings. Adjusting the settings workout the imbalance a bit. There is an inherent fault.
customer_reviews.author: Uday CS

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Replaced a ViewSonic VA2055SA 20-Inch Screen LED-Lit Monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Replaced a ViewSonic VA2055SA 20-Inch Screen LED-Lit Monitor that had horrible shadowing problem with the GTX 960 I bought. This is used for online FPS games and I am told it is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this monitor for about a month and so far I love it. No issues, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vireoli

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, great overall value in my book.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! I mainly use it as a work from home set up preyed with another one.
customer_reviews.author: PSG

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to go with the monitor. Nice picture and the price was right. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Viewsonic
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor for a decent price. I bought this for a Christmas gift for a failing monitor and the person had no complaints. They said the colors where true and the saturation was high. Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picture
customer_reviews.text: Good value, nice images, easy to set up. ViewSonic has a good reputation, these monitor have not disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: The Keyboard Hound

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, but wrong cable
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture for a decent price. I don't use the speakers, so I can't offer an opinion on sound. My only complaint is that it comes with a VGA cable (only). But VGA apparently will not support the recommended display settings of 1920 x 1080. It took me a while to figure this out, but once I switched to a DVI cable, the display settings automatically adjusted to 1920 x 1080, and the picture was no longer stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: bobds

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is fragile. It suffered an accident the ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is fragile. It suffered an accident the day after arrival, damaging the screen. The screen was only lightly scuffed, but video is no longer displayed to the screen. The screen illuminates and you can see the damaged region's pixel color distortions. Beware if you are looking for a monitor to use in a tough environment.
customer_reviews.author: ian jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy and Dead
customer_reviews.text: Even when using an HDMI cable with this monitor there is still some very noticeable fuzziness to everything on the screen. None of the lines seem very crisp nor are the colors very strong even after tampering with the settings for almost an hour. After a week of use there is already a dead pixel in one of the monitors and after speaking with Viewsonic they will not fix it unless 3 pixels are dead. I would not recommend buying this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: What can I say, it is ViewSonic! Sound ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it is ViewSonic! Sound isn't all that grand but no one really expects it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice image and does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: Nice pic and does a great job as a mirror monitor. I use this as a studio monitor for my little booth. I do audio work and this is just what the doc ordered. Much better than the old 19" TV monitor I have used for nearly 4 years! So nice! I wish the menu options were a bit easier to get through but other than that it's a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I havent figured out how to use the speakers and ...
customer_reviews.text: I havent figured out how to use the speakers and there was no instruction manual. It came with a CD but my laptop doesnt have a CD feature. I used another computer to look at it and no help - mainly how to use it with a desktop computer. So I'll have to keep digging. Other than that, huge improvement from the small flat screen I was using. Plus fast transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love the view sonic brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been using view sonic monitors for a long time. They seem to work very well, and outlast the warranty period with no problems. I even bought one of these just to have in case I need it in the future. Very nice as far as I'm concerned. Other makers do not seem so good to me. JMO.
customer_reviews.author: DennyW

customer_reviews.title: Clarity and size make this a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Has taken awhile to adjust to this monitor. I love the size and clarity but dislike the tin-can sound of the speakers. Adjustments aren't easy, I consistently press the wrong button but eventually get the setting right. Other reviewers have complained of difficulty installing the monitor, just following the steps in the instructions makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Can you see me now.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great quality and picture. Easily adapted for wall mounting and simple to use. Works great with my 8 camera system. Would buy again. It’s got basic hookups in the back, no hdmi, however, the dvi input is very clear in image transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. Had it up and installed in no ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift, but so far it is working well. Vibrant colors and oh so clear. Speakers are less than desired so I did not use the monitor speakers. Easy setup. Had it up and installed in no time. This is my third ViewSonic monitor all three computer systems I have.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: The connections come lose easily. It's okay, but less than what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor with a cheap feeling stand. But for the price I am very happy! They can be a little bright out of the box....but nothing you can't correct in the menu. We have about 40 of these and they all worked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten a lemon.....
customer_reviews.text: The plug keeps coming out and when I try to put it in, it takes awhile to stick. Also, whenever I put the computer to sleep it comes back on in a lower resolution than as I left it, and takes up to 20 minutes to figure out how to get it back to high res. I hate this monitor, but it saved me from buying another Apple for $900.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad - but a loose power connecter loses a star
customer_reviews.text: I've used ViewSonic monitors for a long time. I got this one so that I could set up two monitors on my desktop computer. With one minor exception, this is great. The exception; the power cord does not seat firmly in the socket on the monitor. Sometimes just a minor movement of the monitor or something touching the cord pulls the plug out and the power obviously goes off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Tough to color calibrate
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace another Viewsonic monitor. Although my other display was a calibrated Vewsonic, using my computers calibration program, I wasn't able to satisfactorily calibrate the color on this monitor, so it was returned. Didn't keep it long enough to address anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DBR

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has great color resolution and is large enough to fit into a normal computer desk without taking up the entire desk. The only drawback is the sound from the monitor has hardly any volume. You will need external speakers
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Fraher

customer_reviews.title: I love both of them!
customer_reviews.text: It is installed on my computer - the one I'm using to type this review - so, I assume it is working great. I'm not a techie. My computer guru told me to order it, so he could use it to build this new computer, so I did. I love having 2 of these monitors. I can get a lot done and still watch what's happening in multiple sites.
customer_reviews.author: aklittlered

customer_reviews.title: Great for a security monitor for your DVR
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my security monitor at work for my DVR and it displays all colors and pictures nicely. I wouldn't use it for anything other than a standard external display.
customer_reviews.author: bl4ckh4t

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my second monitor of this style. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I bought two and put them side-by-side on the awesome Tyke Supply Dual LCD Monitor Stand. The quality of images, light, color, etc. are fine for me as I only use it for work-related apps and the internet. I don't play games using this monitor so I can't speak to advanced quality needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: present for my son
customer_reviews.text: my sons monitor went out and he was stuck with a tiny little one to use for his computer and to watch tv. I got this for his room and he loves it. This one is larger than the one he had before brighter and much better colors. I am glad we got this one. We looked at replacing the light tube in his old one but this is less expensive and better all around.
customer_reviews.author: Tip in Las Vegas

product_meta.title: ViewSonic VA2246M-LED 22 Inch Full HD 1080p LED Monitor with DVI and VGA Inputs,Black
product_meta.description: Style:22-InchThe ViewSonic VA2246m-LED is a 22" (21.5 Vis) widescreen monitor with an LED backlight and glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or at the office. With Full HD 1920x1080 resolution and a 10M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2246m-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 5ms response time ensures crisp pictures and smooth playback. As a complete multimedia package, the display also includes a pair of integrated speakers. VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional mount flexibility. In addition, a 3-year warranty, along with one of the industry's best pixel performance policies make the VA2246m-LED a great value choice for corporate and educational use as well. Dimensions (imperial) (wxhxd): Packaging (in.): 22.2 x 15.4 x 4.5; Physical (in.): 20.1 x 14.4 x 7.8; Physical Without Stand (in.): 20.1 x 12.5 x 1.9; Dimensions (metric) (wxhxd): Packaging (mm): 565 x 391 x 114; Physical (mm): 509.6 x 366.1 x 197.6; Physical Without Stand (mm); 509.6 x 316.6 x 48.3
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR HOME AND OFFICE: An ideal all-around display for desktop, or laptop
SEE THE DIFFERENCE: Razor-sharp clarity and detail with Full HD (1920x1080p) resolution; Static Contrast Ratio: 1,000:1
MAXIMIZED COLOR & CONTRAST: MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio delivers sharp, crisp images;Panel Surface: 3H Anti-glare, hard-coating.
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VA2246M-LED supports laptops, PCs, Macs, and POS systems with DVI-D, and VGA inputs
INDUSTRY-LEADING WARRANTY: 3-year coverage with access to our US-based customer service team
INCLUDED IN THE BOX: LCD Monitor, Power Cable, Video Cable, and Audio Cable
Power: Eco Mode (Conserve): 12W; Eco Mode (optimized): 16W; Consumption (typical): 22W; Consumption (max): 34W; Voltage: AC 100-240V (universal), 50-60Hz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars924 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
